page.title: 02Farming in Blackridge
page.content:
This is about{farming}in the Blackridge area. There is a lot of heath around here. There are a lot of dairy farms and mixed farms. The{crops are on the low land and the high land is used for grazing. Some farmers use {hay}but most dairy farms use{silage.
{ * * * * * *
The farmers take the {cows to Lanark, Stirling or Biggar{markets. There are slaughterhouses in Bathgate and Shotts to take the fat{lambs}and cows. In one farm there is a{quarry}which had been closed for 27 years. It had a big face on it. In another is a building for the quarry. It is called the magazine for gun powder.
